attributes.action: stop all israel products being sold in the uk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Everyday people go out shopping and purchase products that are from israel. We should boycott all there products as we just make more money for them to purchase more weapons used to destroy palestine,as everyone out there is outraged at the number of people who have been killed over the past 3 weeks. We should be doing everything in our power to stop them not motivate them.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
